Submodules

brainModels.benchmark module

brainModels.run module

brainModels.utils module

brainModels.utils.set_download_dir(path)[source]

Set the download directory if required to change from default mne path Parameters ———- path : None | str The new storage location, if it does not exist, a warning is raised and the path is created If None, and MNE_DATA config does not exist, a warning is raised and the storage location is set to the MNE default directory

brainModels.utils.set_log_level(level='INFO')[source]

Set log level Set the general log level. Use one of the levels supported by python logging, i.e.: DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR, CRITICAL

brainModels.utils.setup_seed(seed: int) → None[source]

Set the seed for random, numpy, TensorFlow and PyTorch. Parameters ———- seed: int

The random seed to use.

Returns

None
